attributes.action: offer a symbolic apology to those regions that retain the anti-gay laws which were imposed upon them by the British Empire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to help campaigners in their own countries obtain their rights, a symbolic apology and a distancing of the British Government from these oppressive colonial laws worldwide would help strengthen activists hands and hasten the day when they can achieve full equality.
